Delete Your Globaro Account

This page explains how users can delete their account and associated data from the Globaro – Voice Phishing Detection App.

How to Request Account Deletion

  1. Open the app and go to My Page.
  2. Scroll down and tap "Delete Account"(회원탈퇴) at the bottom of the screen.
  3. Your account and all associated data will be deleted immediately without a grace period.
⚠️ Warning: Account deletion is irreversible. If you do not wish to delete your account and data, please do not proceed.

What Data Will Be Deleted?

  • Your profile information (name, email, phone number)
  • Saved call recordings and voice files

What Data Will Be Retained?

No data will be retained. All personal information and associated data are permanently deleted immediately upon account deletion.

Alternative Contact Method

If you cannot access the app, you may also contact our Data Protection Officer to request account deletion manually:

  • Email: contact@glosori.com
